summary: A young psychiatric nurse goes to work at a lonesome asylum following a murder. There, she experiences varying degrees of torment from the patients.
cast: Bill McGhee|Jessie Lee Fulton|Robert Dracup|Harryette Warren|Michael Harvey|Jessie Kirby|Hugh Feagin|Betty Chandler|Camilla Carr|Gene Ross|Annabelle Weenick|Rosie Holotik|Rhea MacAdams
title: No miréis en el sótano
